title: NDP leadership candidate apologizes for using AI to respond to Reddit questions
description: Despite being concerned artificial intelligence is replacing workers, NDP leadership candidate and union leader Rob Ashton used AI in his campaign messaging during an "ask me anything" event on Reddit.
content:
Despite being concerned artificial intelligence is replacing workers, NDP leadership candidate and union leader Rob Ashton used AI during an online campaign event on Sunday.

title: AI to move from pilots to production, see wider adoption in 2026: Neysa CEO
description: Neysa, a Mumbai-based AI and cloud infrastructure startup, sees enterprises moving from AI experiments to full-scale adoption. CEO Sharad Sanghi expects artificial general intelligence by 2027 as model reliability improves. Citing a recent MIT study which found that 95% of agentic AI deployments are yet to move to production, Sanghi said that that will change over the next 12 months, marking a major shift in enterprise adoption this year.
content:

title: Peering into the future of an uncertain world
description: Among all forces, artificial intelligence (AI) may be the most transformative — and unsettling. Previous revolutions replaced muscle power; AI replaces brainpower. It will reshape not just industries but identities.
content:
By Rajat M Nag

title: Greed, deepfakes & dirty Money: Financial crime enters the AI age

title: Pentagon is embracing Musk’s Grok AI chatbot as it draws global outcry
